editor.models

Class TileModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.mvc.model.BaseModel
      • editor.models.TileModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, ISerializable<java.lang.String>, IXMLCodec, ISignalListener, IRenderable

    public final class TileModel
extends BaseModel
    Model representation of a single tile within the tilemap structure
    Author:
    Daniel Ricci <thedanny09@icloud.com>
